name: The Klassic Adventures of Kaptain Klassic (early demo)
name_original: The Klassic Adventures of Kaptain Klassic (early demo)
description:
WARNING: This is a very early demo. The full version should be available on physical cartridges on or around March 25th, 2024.

Kaptain Klassic had just won a PVP Station Light at a crane game for just $1. However, a Bump had stolen it from him and got away. Now Kaptain Klassic must retrieve it back!

Controls: 

Arrow Keys -- Move

Z (A button) -- Jump/skip block of dialogue

X (B Button) -- Start game/launch dodgeball/sprint

[This game is authorized by Seth Alan Jacobs.]
